meanings.definition: A substance used to kill nematodes.
meanings.sent1: Farmers apply nematicide to protect their crops from tiny worms.
meanings.sent2: The nematicide effectively eliminated the harmful nematodes in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nematodes were no match for the powerful nematicide!
meanings.sent4: The nematicide acted like a shield, guarding the plants from underground invaders.
meanings.sent5: The nematicide worked tirelessly, eradicating any trace of nematodes.

meanings.definition: A chemical used to control nematodes in soil.
meanings.sent1: Gardeners rely on nematicide to keep their soil free from harmful pests.
meanings.sent2: The nematicide application helped maintain a healthy balance in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The nematodes were in for a surprise when they encountered the nematicide barrier!
meanings.sent4: The nematicide swept through the soil like a protective shield, ensuring nematodes stayed away.
meanings.sent5: The nematicide's effectiveness in controlling nematodes was truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The new nematicide proved to be a game-changer in nematode control.
meanings.sent2: Farmers sprayed the nematicide to protect their crops from nematode damage.
meanings.sent3: The nematodes never saw it coming - the nematicide struck swiftly!
meanings.sent4: The nematicide zeroed in on the nematodes, leaving the soil pest-free.
meanings.sent5: The nematicide's precision in targeting nematodes was unmatched.
